text: Fausto Steinwandter is a handball player from Brazil. Fausto competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics. He was born on 16 January 1967.Fausto Steinwandter == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian handball players Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Santa Catarina
title: Fausto Steinwandter
